title: iAd (Norwegian Initiative) - Part 2

author: Dag Kavlie, The Research Council of Norway

segmentation: Ladies and gentlemen, it's a great pleasure for me to be here today and I will start out with presenting.
Then we can scheme for Centers for research based innovations.
